    • setCurrAdventureCard

      public void setCurrAdventureCard(ClientCard currAdventureCard)
      Sets the current adventure card for the client model. If the GUI adapter (modelFxAdapter) is available and ready (i.e., isCardAdapter returns true), it schedules an asynchronous check using a Timer to update the GUI once the adapter is ready. Implements proper timer cleanup to prevent memory leaks.

      This ensures that the GUI update is non-blocking and runs only when the adapter is in the correct state.

      Parameters:
      currAdventureCard - the new current adventure card to be set

    • getCurrAdventureCard

      public ClientCard getCurrAdventureCard()
      Gets the current adventure card.
      Returns:
      the current adventure card

    • getSortedRanking

      public List<String> getSortedRanking()
      Retrieves a sorted list of player nicknames based on their flying board position. Players still flying are sorted in descending order by position. Landed players are placed at the end of the list.
      Returns:
      a list of all player nicknames with flying players first (sorted by position) and landed players last

    • getOutPlayers

      public List<String> getOutPlayers()

    • updatePlayerCredits

      public void updatePlayerCredits(String nickname, int newOwnedCredits)
      Updates the cosmic credits for a player. If the updated player is the current player, refreshes the cosmic credits display.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player to update
      newOwnedCredits - new amount of credits for the player

      Adds a new player to the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player to add
      color - color assigned to the player
      isTestFlight - whether the player is in test flight mode
      isGui - whether the player is using GUI interface

    • extractCubeRewardsFromCurrentCard

      public List<CargoCube> extractCubeRewardsFromCurrentCard() throws IllegalStateException
      Extracts the information about cube rewards from the current card. Uses the ClientCard object properties directly instead of string parsing.
      Returns:
      List of CargoCube that represent the rewards of the current card
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no active card is available
